title: GO-Biz: Atomic Machines, Inc. - California Competes Tax Credit (CCTC) Agreement Documentation

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I hereby request the following records related to the California Competes Tax Credit (CCTC) Agreement between GO-Biz and Atomic Machines, Inc. (https://www.atomicmachines.com). This agreement was widely reported and can be found online here: https://business.ca.gov/wp-content/uploads/Atomic-Machines-Inc.-CCTC-Agreement.pdf

Agreement dated approximately November 2025):

Compliance Reports: All annual compliance reports, worksheets, and supporting documentation submitted by Atomic Machines, Inc. for Taxable Year 2025 (and 2026 to date) to demonstrate the achievement of milestones related to net increase of full-time employees and investment amounts.

Milestone Evaluations: Any written determinations or correspondence from GO-Biz verifying that Atomic Machines, Inc. has met its "Project/Milestone" requirements as set forth in Section 3 and Exhibit A of the Agreement.

Recapture or Breach Notices: Any records, notices, or internal memoranda discussing potential "Events of Breach" (pursuant to Section 10 of the Agreement) or the "Recapture" of tax credits due to the company’s failure to maintain hiring or investment targets.

Wage Verifications: Redacted payroll summaries or certifications provided by the company to verify it has met the "Minimum Annual Wage" and "Cumulative Average Annual Wage" commitments for California full-time employees.

Relocation Disclosures: Any communications from the company regarding its certification that, absent this credit, it would have "terminated all or a portion of its employees in California or relocate[d]... to another state.

This request is made in the public interest to ensure transparency regarding the allocation of $15,000,000 in taxpayer-funded credits - especially considering the reputation of Atomic Machine's leadership.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert Delaware

title: FOIA Request: Flock Safety/ALPR Systems (Mille Lacs Sheriff)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all records regarding the acquisition, installation, and use of Automated License Plate Readers (ALPRs), specifically those provided by the vendor "Flock Safety" or "Flock Group Inc." This request includes, but is not limited to:

- Right-of-Way Installation Permits: Any approved or pending permits for the installation of ALPR cameras within county right-of-ways.

- Invoices: All invoices, purchase orders, or payment records related to ALPR hardware, software, subscriptions, or services.

- Contracts: Any agreements, contracts, or Memorandums of Understanding (MOUs) entered into with ALPR vendors (specifically Flock Safety).

- Communications: All emails, memos, or correspondence discussing the installation, maintenance, or funding of ALPR systems that contain the keyword "Flock."

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Anonymous
